column1: His hearty voice was soon familiar to and popular with many thousands of listeners up and down the west coast and he invariably ended his broadcasts with a special Good - Night wish to a different section of the community each evening, such as to June brides, to lighthouse keepers ‘ out there in the dark’, or to all dentists who might be ‘ looking down in the mouth’.
